testimonials.title: Customer Story
testimonials.text: Bazubagira Pharazie, who runs a sewing business jointly with her husband.
testimonials.quote: The brightness of MeshPowerâ€™s light is very convenient with our line of work, because sewing requires extra brightness than usual.

testimonials.title: Customer Story
testimonials.text: Mr. Valens runs a local shop.
testimonials.quote: The additional hours of light in the evening has improved my business, as I am open for longer.

testimonials.title: Customer Story
testimonials.text: Mr David is a  father of 4 kids, 3 of them school age. His main concern was the health of his kids due to the smoke they were exposed to by using kerosene light.
testimonials.quote: MeshPower has really improved their lives because they can study and do their homework in the evening. They are expecting better school reports!
